IERC721Receiver.metadata: {"compiler":{"version":"0.8.30+commit.73712a01"},"language":"Solidity","output":{"abi":[{"inputs":[{"internalType":"address","name":"operator","type":"address"},{"internalType":"address","name":"from","type":"address"},{"internalType":"uint256","name":"tokenId","type":"uint256"},{"internalType":"bytes","name":"data","type":"bytes"}],"name":"onERC721Received","outputs":[{"internalType":"bytes4","name":"","type":"bytes4"}],"stateMutability":"nonpayable","type":"function"}],"devdoc":{"kind":"dev","methods":{},"version":1},"userdoc":{"kind":"user","methods":{"onERC721Received(address,address,uint256,bytes)":{"notice":"\u4ec0\u4e48\u65f6\u5019\u4f1a\u8c03\u7528\u8fd9\u4e2a\u51fd\u6570\uff1a\u5f53\u4f60\u505a safeTransferFrom \u65f6\uff1a \u5982\u679c to \u662f\u4e00\u4e2a\u5408\u7ea6\uff1aERC721 \u5408\u7ea6\u7528 to.code.length \u68c0\u67e5\u662f\u4e0d\u662f\u5408\u7ea6 \u5982\u679c\u662f\u5408\u7ea6 \u2192 \u5fc5\u987b\u8c03\u7528 onERC721Received \u5bf9\u65b9\u5408\u7ea6\u5fc5\u987b\u8fd4\u56de \u8fd9\u4e2a\u56fa\u5b9a\u7684 selector\uff1a 1.\u8fd9\u4e2a\u65b9\u6cd5\u53ea\u662f\u544a\u8bc9\u94fe\uff1a\u201c\u6211\u662f\u4e00\u4e2a\u80fd\u63a5\u6536 NFT \u7684\u5408\u7ea6\u3002 2. \u53ea\u6709\u5408\u7ea6\u5730\u5740\u624d\u4f1a\u89e6\u53d1\u8fd9\u4e2a\u9a8c\u8bc1\u3002 3. \u5408\u7ea6\u5fc5\u987b\u8fd4\u56de\u6b63\u786e selector\uff0c\u5426\u5219 NFT \u667a\u80fd\u5408\u7ea6\u4f1a\u62d2\u7edd\u53d1\u9001\uff08\u4fdd\u62a4 NFT \u907f\u514d\u88ab\u9501\u6b7b\uff09 if (to.code.length > 0) {   // \u5bf9\u8c61\u662f\u5408\u7ea6 retval = IERC721Receiver(to).onERC721Received(...) if (retval != selector) revert \"Invalid receiver\"; }*"}},"notice":"IERC721Receiver \u662f\u4e00\u4e2a\u6807\u51c6\u63a5\u53e3\uff0c\u7528\u4e8e\u4fdd\u8bc1 NFT \u88ab\u5b89\u5168\u5730\u8f6c\u5230\u4e00\u4e2a\u5408\u7ea6\u91cc\u3002\u53ea\u6709\u5b9e\u73b0\u4e86 onERC721Received \u7684\u5408\u7ea6\u624d\u80fd\u63a5\u6536 NFT\u3002*","version":1}},"settings":{"compilationTarget":{"contracts/IERC721Receiver.sol":"IERC721Receiver"},"evmVersion":"prague","libraries":{},"metadata":{"bytecodeHash":"ipfs"},"optimizer":{"enabled":false,"runs":200},"remappings":[]},"sources":{"contracts/IERC721Receiver.sol":{"keccak256":"0xe1646ba0d365c65b5452ce99dc77ca18b38531dbd8ce3b013fe80bf780f8daa6","license":"MIT","urls":["bzz-raw://4511c3ca9657be4ee5dad9d622e6b161ebad8121f82be1e38c41ee8d705448a9","dweb:/ipfs/Qma4dy5A2SncZqDRv5F1nuDE81Kj6dvvuA5TRUAHUXjnFF"]}},"version":1}

onERC721Received(address,address,uint256.notice: 什么时候会调用这个函数：当你做 safeTransferFrom 时： 如果 to 是一个合约：ERC721 合约用 to.code.length 检查是不是合约 如果是合约 → 必须调用 onERC721Received 对方合约必须返回 这个固定的 selector： 1.这个方法只是告诉链：“我是一个能接收 NFT 的合约。 2. 只有合约地址才会触发这个验证。 3. 合约必须返回正确 selector，否则 NFT 智能合约会拒绝发送（保护 NFT 避免被锁死） if (to.code.length > 0) {   // 对象是合约 retval = IERC721Receiver(to).onERC721Received(...) if (retval != selector) revert "Invalid receiver"; }*

userdoc.notice: IERC721Receiver 是一个标准接口，用于保证 NFT 被安全地转到一个合约里。只有实现了 onERC721Received 的合约才能接收 NFT。*

documentation.text: IERC721Receiver 是一个标准接口，用于保证 NFT 被安全地转到一个合约里。只有实现了 onERC721Received 的合约才能接收 NFT。*

什么时候会调用这个函数：当你做 safeTransferFrom 时：
如果 to 是一个合约：ERC721 合约用 to.code.length 检查是不是合约
如果是合约 → 必须调用 onERC721Received
对方合约必须返回 这个固定的 selector：
1.这个方法只是告诉链：“我是一个能接收 NFT 的合约。
2. 只有合约地址才会触发这个验证。
3. 合约必须返回正确 selector，否则 NFT 智能合约会拒绝发送（保护 NFT 避免被锁死）
if (to.code.length > 0) {   // 对象是合约
retval = IERC721Receiver(to).onERC721Received(...)
if (retval != selector) revert "Invalid receiver";
}*
